lyrics:
Vaya con Dios Lyrics[Verse 1]
Now, the hacienda's dark
The town is sleeping
Now, the time has come to part
The time for weeping

[Chorus]
Vaya con Dios, my darling
Vaya con Dios, my love

[Verse 2]
Now, the village mission bells
Are softly ringing
If you listen with your heart
You'll hear them singing
[Chorus]
Vaya con Dios, my darling
Vaya con Dios, my love

[Bridge]
Wherever you may be, I'll be beside you
Although you're many million dreams away
Each night I'll say a prayer
A prayer to guide you
To hasten every lonely hour of every lonely day

[Verse 3]
Now, the dawn is breaking through
A gray tomorrow
But the memories we share
Are there to borrow

[Chorus]
Vaya con Dios, my darling
Vaya con Dios, my love

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
Vaya con Dios, my darling
Vaya con Dios, my loveEmbed
